description: Web interface for visualizing and browsing databases, tables, and their data with interactive features, loading data dynamically via fetch API.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and populates sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resets UI states.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands/collapses a database node, loads tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders data into an HTML table with interactive cells.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual cell content, handles objects, long strings, nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long or object data.

calls: innerHTML assignment in various DOM elements
